First, I load my libraries
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)  
```

Cleaning the `pols-month.csv` data
```{r}
pols_df= 
  read_csv("data_hw2/pols-month.csv") |>
separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") |>
mutate(
  year = as.integer(year),
  month = as.integer(month),
  month = month.name[month],
  president = ifelse(prez_gop == 1, "gop", "dem")) |>

  select(-day, -prez_gop, -prez_dem)
```


Cleaning the `snp.csv` data

```{r}
snp_df= 
  read_csv("data_hw2/snp.csv")|>
  separate(date, into = c("month", "day", "year"), sep = "/") |>
  mutate(
    year = as.integer(year),
    month = as.integer(month),
    month = month.name[month]) |>
  select(year, month, close) |>
  arrange(year, month)
```

Cleaning the `unemployment.csv` data

```{r}
unemployment_df= 
  read_csv("data_hw2/unemployment.csv")
```
